EmailInsightAction.name: EmailInsightAction
EmailInsightAction.description: Represents the actions that have been taken, or could be taken, in relation to email insights. It logs different types of actions and associated metadata, helping to track and manage the activities and decisions made based on email insights.

EmailInsightId.description: Required. The ID of the email insight where the action is applied.

InsightAction.description: Required. The action that's taken on the email insight.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the email insight action record is locked or not.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the email insight action record can be edited or not.

RowVersion.description: A system-generated, read-only field that tracks the version of a record. Each time a record is created or updated, the RowVersion value increments, providing a mechanism to detect changes and manage concurrency.
